# Glossary {.unnumbered #sec-glossary}

<!-- 
# Read the glossary from the YAML file

# Iterate over the terms in the glossary and print them

``` -->

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

glossary <- yaml::read_yaml("glossary.yml",readLines.warn=FALSE)

sorted_names <- sort(names(glossary))

glossary_new <- glossary[sorted_names]

for (term in names(glossary_new)) {
    # cat("## ", term, "{#sec-", term , "} \n\n", glossary[[term]], "\n\n", sep = "")
    cat("## ", term, " \n\n", glossary[[term]], "\n\n", sep = "")
}
```
